entities.name: dark wizards
entities.description: A group of people with magical powers that are considered evil.

entities.name: professor umbridge
entities.description: The Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher who is described as having a fake smile.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: A student in the class who is known for his experiences with Cedric Diggory's death.

entities.name: cedric diggory
entities.description: A student who died on a night that Harry experienced.

entities.name: seamus
entities.description: A student in the class who looks half-scared and half-fascinated at Harry.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend who has heard about Cedric Diggory's death.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's friend who tries to warn him and is one of the few people who knows about Cedric Diggory's death.

relationships.description: Harry stares at Professor Umbridge, who is staring back at him without a fake smile.
Hermione tries to warn Harry by tugging at his sleeve.
Seamus looks half-scared and half-fascinated at Harry.
Ron has heard about Cedric Diggory's death.
Hermione is one of the few people who knows about Cedric Diggory's death.
